Description: Available for SEPTEMBER 1, 2023. Beautiful two bed/one bath unit in heart of the North End. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite counters. Large living/dining room with exposed brick and gleaming hardwood floors. Completely renovated bathroom with tiled shower, brand new tile floor, and granite vanity. Close to Hanover Street, Faneuil Hall & Quincy Market. Easy access to public transportation, major routes. New HVAC system with central A/C. Washer and Dryer in-unit. Available for SEPTEMBER 1, 2023.
